1.「よう ジェイコフ。| その若いのが ウワサの新しい弟子かい？: Hey, Jakov. Is that young man your new|apprentice?

2.「これは これは ゴードンさん。| 相変わらず お元気そうで なによりですな。|: Well, well, well, Mr. Gordon. I'm glad to see|that you are as healthy as ever. And how can I|help you today?

3.「んだぁっ！？| テメーは アニキに聞かれたことにだけ| 答えてりゃあいいんじゃ: What? You only answer what you're asked by|your brother!

4.「ハハ…… こりゃ すみません。| ええ。おっしゃる通り こいつが| 新しい弟子: Ha ha... Sorry about this. Sorry about that.|You were right. This is my new apprentice,|<pc>.

5.「ほらっ。オメーも ゴードンさんに| ごあいさつしねえか！: Come on. You too, say hello to Coral Gordon!

6.「ああ いい いい。……で 約束通り| こいつを モンスター勝ち抜きバトルの|: Oh, good, good. So... we're going to put him|in the ring for the Monster Championship, like|we promised, right?

7.「はい それはもう！ こいつが 戦って| 借金が チャラになるんなら| 何百回で: Yes, that's it!　If he can clear his debt by|fighting, I'll let him fight hundreds or|thousands of times.

8.「あんたも カネにだらしない師匠を| 持っちまって 災難だよなぁ。| ククク……: It's a pity that you also have a master who is|sloppy with money. Kukuku... I feel for you|from the bottom of my heart.

9.「モンスター勝ち抜きバトルってーと| ブランドン様のペットたちと 戦うのかよ？|: Monster battle of the winners...against Master|Brandon's pets? Poor little guy...

10.「……いいだろう。こいつなら| 中年バトルマスターを戦わせるより| 客も 呼べる: That's fine. This guy will bring in more|customers than having a middle-aged battle|master fight.

11.「せいぜい いい仕事をして 盛り上げてくれよ。| 受け付けは いつも通り クラー: Do a good job and keep it lively. Clark will|take care of the reception as usual, so please|let him through.

12.「全国１０００万のコロシアムファンの皆さま| たいへん お待たせしました！| 本: To the 10 million fans of the Coliseum, here|we go again! Today, the bloody feast is about|to begin again!

13.「コロシアムの裏名物 モンスター勝ち抜き戦！| 今夜の挑戦者は 若きバトルマスタ:
It's the backstage specialty of the Coliseum,|the Monster Winner's Tournament! Tonight's|challenger is the young battle master|
|.

14.<if_woman>「はたして 彼女は 無事に| リングを下りることが できるの: <if_woman>Will she make it out of the ring in one piece?|The hour of doom is drawing nearer and nearer.<else>Will He make it out of the ring in one piece?|The hour of doom is drawing nearer and nearer.<endif>

15.「見事 イエティを倒した| <pc>選手。あと１勝。| あと１勝すれば 勝利の栄: Well done <pc> for defeating Powie|Yowie. One more win. One more win and the|glory of victory is yours!

16.<if_woman>「しかし 立ちはだかるカベは あまりに高い。| ３回戦の相手: <if_woman>But the obstacles in her way are too high, and|her opponent in the third round is the Knight|Errant. How will she fight this opponent?<else>But the obstacles in his way are too high, and|his opponent in the third round is the Knight|Errant. How will he fight this opponent?<endif>

18.「なんと！ なんと！ なんと！| 今日のバトルが 始まる前に| 誰が この結果を: Oh, my God!　Oh, my God!　Oh, my God! Who would|have predicted this outcome before today's|battle began?

19.「私は 今 新たなコロシアムの伝説の誕生に| 立ち会っているのかもしれません。|: I may now be witnessing the birth of a new|Coliseum legend. Thanks for the inspiration,|<pc> players!

21.「ただいま入った情報では| 控えで用意していた モンスター３体が| オリを破って: We have just received information that three|of the monsters we had in reserve have broken|through the cage and escaped.

22.「まずいぞ！ まずいぞぉ！| <pc>選手 あぶなぁ～～～い！！: This is not good!　This is not good!|<pc> Watch out!

24.「これは いったい どうしたことだ！？| 突如 現れた 仮面の男が ３体の魔物を: What the hell is going on? A masked man|suddenly appeared and defeated three monsters|in an instant!

25.「……と とにかく サプライズ続きの| 本日の モンスター勝ち抜き戦でしたが|: ...and anyway, today's monster winner's|tournament was full of surprises, but we'll|leave it at that!

26.「ンフフフフ……。| じつに 見事な 勝ちっぷりでしたねぇ。| 私 あなたのファ: That was a very impressive win. I've become|your Fan Fan.

27.「それにしても あの仮面の男……| どうやら バトルマスターだったようなので|: But still, that masked man...it seems he was a|battle master, so let's call him "Mask Buster"|for short.

28.「彼は いったい 何者なんでしょうねぇ？| あの後 係員たちが 探したのですが|: Who the hell is he? The staff members searched|for him afterwards, but they couldn't find him|anywhere.

29.「あれほどの実力を持ちながら| 正体を隠し 姿をくらますなんて| よほど 後ろ暗: Is he really that dark, that he could be so|powerful and yet hide his true identity and|disappear?

30.「ンフフフフ……。| あなたといい 仮面バスターといい| やはり コロシアムは: I'm sure the Coliseum is very exciting, just|like you and the masked buster.

31.「おお よくやってくれたな！| オメーの活躍は見せてもらってたぜ。| おかげで: Oh, you did good! I've been following your|exploits. Thanks to you, my debt is wiped out.|Guffaw...

32.「これは 師匠からの ごほうびだ。| ありがたく 受け取るがいいぞ。: This is a reward from the master. Accept it|gratefully.

33.「オメーの はたらきには| これからも期待してるからな。| オレの言うことを よ: I'll be counting on you to do your work from|now on. I'm counting on you to do your best.

34.「いきなり モンスター勝ち抜き戦に| 放り込むなんて 相変わらず| 弟子使いが: It seems that you still have a rough pupil to|throw him into the monster competition out of|the blue.

35.「ゲゲッ！ テメーは セインズ……。| 今さら 何しに現れやがった！？: Geez!　You, Sainz... what the hell are you|doing here?

36.「あんたが 新しい弟子をとったと聞いて| 様子を見にきたんですよ。| 元弟子とし:
I heard that you had taken on a new|apprentice, so I came to check on you. As a|former apprentice, I couldn't leave it at|
|that.

37.「お前さんが <pc>か。| モンスター勝ち抜き戦 見せてもらったよ。| なかな: So you're <pc>. I've been watching|your Monster Winner's Tournament. You seem to|have a pretty good point.

38.「しかし こんな師匠を持っちまって| 苦労するよなぁ……オレなんて| 途中で 投: But it must be hard to have such a master... I|had to give up halfway through.

39.「まあ 何かあったら この不肖の先輩が| 相談にのるからよ。| くじけずに がん: Well, if you have any problems, my senior will|be here to help you. Don't be discouraged and|do your best.

40.「……ケッ！ | 師匠不孝モンが 先輩風 吹かせやがって！: Damn it!　You filial son of a bitch! You're|making me out to be a senior!

41.「ああ 胸クソ悪い。| 今日はもう 寝ちまうことにするぜ！: Oh, I'm so sick of this. I'm gonna go to sleep|now!

42.「１回戦の相手は あばれこまいぬ。| この残忍かつ 凶暴な魔物を相手に| <pc: The opponent in the first round is Foo Dog.|How will <pc> fight against this|brutal and ferocious monster?

44.「見事 あばれこまいぬを倒した| <pc>選手。| しかし その苦難は まだまだ: <pc> defeated Abarekomainu with|flying colors. However, his hardship|continues.

45.<if_woman>「２回戦の相手は イエティ。| この 恐るべき怪物を相手に|: <if_woman>The opponent in the second round is the Powie|Yowie.
